about.title: About Me
about.description1: With over 18 years of specialized experience in commercial aircraft maintenance and technical consultancy, I have established myself as a trusted expert in aircraft redelivery projects, airworthiness documentation, and fleet transitions across multiple aircraft platforms.
about.description2: My expertise spans major aircraft manufacturers including Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, ATR, and Fokker, with extensive experience in lessor inspections, records audits, and physical condition reviews for airlines and leasing companies worldwide.

deliveryAuditor.title: Delivery Document Auditor
deliveryAuditor.description: Performed comprehensive records audits including ADs, SBs, and APU documentation on several Embraer 195 aircraft for delivery acceptance.

lessorRep.title: Lessor Representative
lessorRep.description: Led comprehensive redelivery inspection and records audit of EMB 195 aircraft, ensuring compliance with lessor requirements and airworthiness standards.

systemsEngineer.title: Systems Engineer
systemsEngineer.description: Managed MEL and maintenance programs for multiple aircraft types, served as technical liaison with OEMs, handled PMA material approvals, and successfully integrated ATR-42 into TAM fleet operations.

engineer.title: Engineer
engineer.description: Planned and executed heavy maintenance and redelivery checks for A320/A330 fleets. Oversaw aircraft and engine redelivery to major lessors including GECAS, JSA, MCAP, McLarens, and ACG.
